note:
I’m a professional genealogist, writer, and researcher 🕵🏻‍♂️.  

My globetrotting 🌍 began in San Luis Potosí 🇲🇽. Next, I arrived in Chicago 🩵, the place where my Polish, Irish, Mexican, Slovenian, and Croatian ancestors converged. While living in Salt Lake City ❄️, I completed genealogy programs with Boston University and Salt Lake Community College.  

Currently based in A Coruña 💙🤍, I continue to document and be inspired by the forces of nature 🌀 contained in my matrilineal line.
